mapper.insert: insert into tbl_teacher(tno, class_name, price, personnel, target, certificate, introduce) values (#{tno}, #{class_name}, #{price}, #{personnel}, #{target}, #{certificate}, #{introduce})
mapper.select: select * from tbl_teacher order by tno
mapper.update: update tbl_teacher set class_name = #{class_name}, price = #{price}, personnel = #{personnel}, target = #{target}, certificate = #{certificate, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, introduce = #{introduce} where tno = #{tno}
